body.p:
Bluespring Grove Barren cty Jany 8/ 64
To his Excellency Governor Bramlette

Dear Sir This will accompany a petition of W H Roberts asking of you to Remit a portion or all of a fine agst him on an attachment bond he is My neighbor and I have no doubt but the case is Just as he Represents it anything you can do for him in getting him clear of the fine will meet the approbation of all that are acquainted with the circumstance
enclosed you will a copy of the execution on should you Remit it as I hope you will will you will please Direct to W. H. Roberts Horse cave Ky
We have no Mail on this Road from Greensburg to Glasgow anything you can do in this case will be kindly by your Friend

Green Cir Ct
vs
T E Bramlette
W. H. Roberts
$100.
forfeited Bail
12th Jany/64
